attributes.action: Higher minimum wage for heavy goods vehicle and public service vehicle drivers
attributes.background: You pay peanuts, you get monkeys. We don't want monkeys in charge of 30 ton HGV's or PSV's. These drivers work long and unsociable hours so that you can have you parcel next day or fresh perishable goods in your shops, and so you can have a bus service to take you to work in the morning
